DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Population/Subjects : Individuals breast cancer identify among patient population National Naval Medical Center ( NNMC ) . Patients refer NNMC Breast Care Center ) NNMCBCC diagnosis management ( surgical treatment radiation treatment chemotherapy ) histologically establish breast cancer ( stage I , II , III , IV ) 20012003 , eligible participate study . Healthy female individual control . Subjects must 18 year age postpuberty breast cancer occur prior puberty ; see presurgical medical intervention baseline measurement agree participate six followup visit 3045 minute duration next twoyears . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Subject chooses participate study . Subjects unable complete clinical examination test . Subjects unable complete questionnaires/surveys . Subjects age 18 .
